game_description: Retro Arcade VR: Asteroids is a reconstruction of a brilliant game that conquered the reality of the 80s. Rediscover the possibilities of the game and experience it in a previously unknown form through the VR headsets. Move into the virtual world of the extraterrestrial universe, become captain of a spaceship and lead it. Face the lurking dangers in space. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of arcade games, feel nostalgia and experience asteroids with modern technology. Don't let yourself be limited and go with times. Upgrade your ship, earn points, compete with friends and conquer the cosmos with RAV: Asteroids. Expect: - Unforgettable arcade experiences in VR - Three game-changing control modes - Complex achivement system - Singleplayer and multiplayer modes
